dialogueLines.line: I heard a pair of kids are here...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Hmmm, it's so dark. It's very difficult to find them in a place like this...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Oh, look, look! There's a zombie girl!
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: Hey you! You're really good at dressing up as a zombie!
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: Yeah! It looks real, like brains and all!
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: No, no, you guys. I'm a real zombie. You see, I'm bleeding.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Oh my gosh! A real zombie came to see us!
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: Zombie girl! Come dance with us!
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: Hahaha, good idea. I like this kind of groove!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Cute little ghosts, will you sing along with me for fun?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily
